entry.name: contextmenu
entry.title: .contextmenu()
entry.desc: Bind an event handler to the "contextmenu" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.

argument.name: eventData
argument.desc: An object containing data that will be passed to the event handler.

longdesc.p: This method is a shortcut for .on( "contextmenu", handler ) in the first two variations, and .trigger( "contextmenu" ) in the third. The contextmenu event is sent to an element when the right button of the mouse is clicked on it, but before the context menu is displayed.
